definitions: A business strategy where an organization hires external personnel on a temporary basis to supplement their existing in-house teams.
The practice of acquiring skilled staff from an external provider to fill specific roles or projects within a company, often to address short-term needs or skill gaps.
examples: We utilized Staff Augmentation Services to complete the project on time.
Many companies turn to Staff Augmentation Services for specialized IT skills.
The budget includes funds for Staff Augmentation Services next quarter.
